description:
Do you feel overwhelmed when it comes to creating visual content for your blog, slideshows, and social posts? If yes, you come to the right place.

This course will show you how to create visual content that pops using Canva. It also teaches you basic principles to have great design such as how to choose background, fonts, colors, creating shapes or layouts, you name it. This course also shows you how to produce your branding kit to use over and over again.

You will also learn step by step to create graphics for your blog post, captivating presentations, engaging social updates for your business.
title: How to Make Visual Content that Pops with Canva
